ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 81
ygData.msgSnippet: ... as ... and ... you re ... if ... their ... Ok Xill, you convinced me. My next character was gonna be an Enchanter, now I m gonna try a Shadowknight again
ygData.messageBody:
> For all you young SKs out there, DONT GIVE UP!!! I almost quit in disgust
> many times and I am on a PvP server, so I have that to deal with at times
as
> well. But I love my charecter so much I stuck with it. The SK suffers SO
> much at low levels, but once you crest over 20 and get your dual attack,
and
> then 22 where you get some minor healing and other usefull spells if
you're
> rescourcefull...there is no looking back. I often have 130 dammage sets
if
> I DONT reposte, and no dual wield weapons anyone can get untwinked at my
> level come close to compeating. Our pet now contributes in PvP (THEY
> LISTENED!!) and I find my class being more welcome in groups than the
> paladin or ranger.
>
> PvP? Dont get me started. We rule. Warrior with big whacker and pet =
> move along to next target. Our ability to Shadowstep and lay layer after
> layer of DoT is truely dreaded, and the harm touch means I dont have to
> personaly kill them all the way. PvP with other tanks is tough due to
their
> hit points and resistances, but I eat casters for lunch (except those damn
> enchanters, they suck! But Pumice Stones are a spiffy solution to Charm)
>
> wow, I am just going on and on!!
>
> Enough. Lets revive this board and get the newer players in the swing of
> the best class in all of Norrath, the dreaded Shadowknight!!!

Ok Xill, you convinced me. My next character was gonna be an Enchanter, now
I'm gonna try a Shadowknight again instead.:)

Malvolin(Teir'Dal Necromancer on Rallos Zek; Formerly Azalin, Human
Shadowknight on Veeshan(whose name was for some reason rejected by the
server last night))
